SELECT A.DEPT_ID FROM BSC_DEPTINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE B.YEAR = #findYear#
B.SC_DEPT_ID = #findScDeptCd#
B.DEPT_ID = #findDeptId#
SELECT DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND SC_DEPT_ID = #findScDeptCd# ORDER BY DEPT_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NM FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE (YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID) IN (SELECT YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE (METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR) IN (SELECT METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND METRIC_ID = #findMetricId#) AND DELETE_DT IS NULL)

SELECT YEAR, MON, A.DEPT_CD, B.DEPT_NM, RPT_TC, RPT_TC_NM, ROLE_TC, ROLE_TC_NM, INSP_KIND_TC, INSP_KIND_TC_NM, LAW_TC, LAW_TC_NM, STIC_LAG_TC, STIC_LAG_TC_NM, STIC_MID_TC, STIC_MID_TC_NM, STIC_SML_TC, STIC_SML_TC_NM, CUM_REQ_QTY, CUM_REQ_AMT, CUM_INSP_QTY, CUM_RE_REQ_QTY, CUM_RE_REQ_AMT, CUM_RE_INSP_QTY FROM TABLE (BSC_SYSTEM_KGS.F_V_GHF0221D_LIST (#findYear#, #findMon#)) A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEPT_CD IN ('4000', '4H00')
AND A.DEPT_CD IN ('4000', '4H00')
AND A.DEPT_CD IN ('5100', '5200')
AND A.DEPT_CD IN ('5100', '5200')
AND A.DEPT_CD IN ('3100', '3F00')
AND A.DEPT_CD IN ('3100', '3F00')
AND A.DEPT_CD IN ('3100', '3F00', '3J00', '3L00')
AND A.YEAR = #findYear#
AND A.YEAR = #findYear#
AND A.YEAR = #findYear#
AND A.DEPT_CD = #findDeptId#
AND A.DEPT_CD = #findDeptId#
AND A.DEPT_CD = #findDeptId#

SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A , BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL B WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND B.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# AND B.INSERT_GUBUN = '01' ORDER BY B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM
